messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report
Sector vendor prices is currently at 150%.
The station spending power is currently 2300 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 506 Credits.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.body: Ok so i spawned a rod to kill the ai and now its looping, welcome crew member rod!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Recreation Area.
